projects.title: react-excel-renderer
projects.description: Published an npm module to render and display excel sheets on web pages

projects.title: hdfs-uploader
projects.description: Developed both front-end(React) and back-end(Node) of a webapp that can be used to upload files to hdfs

projects.title: remote-shell-file-executor
projects.description: Developed a node module that allows user with appropriate credentials to ssh to a machine and execute a shell script remotely

projects.title: Holidify
projects.description: Developed a web application that works as a one-stop-shop to a user going on a holiday using Angular 2. It allowed users to store all holiday related information (booking tickets, hotels, flights etc) under one application

projects.title: Office Hours
projects.description: A react-native application that measures the number of hours spent in office and notifies user after mandatory hours are completed

projects.title: Employee Management Portal
projects.description: An Angular based SPA that deals with simple day-to-day activities of employee

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor in Engineering (Computer Science), University of Pune

questions.question: Describe a complex feature you recently developed using React and Node.js. What were the main challenges and how did you overcome them?
Explain the differences between RESTful APIs and GraphQL. When would you choose one over the other?
How do you approach performance optimization for a web application's frontend?
Explain your experience with CI/CD pipelines. Which tools have you used, and what are the key benefits in your opinion?
Describe your experience with database technologies like PostgreSQL or MongoDB.
Explain the concept of event delegation in JavaScript and provide a use case.
How familiar are you with testing in React? What kind of tests have you written?
